backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for a clothing e-commerce backend that manages products and per-user shopping carts, with functions to add products, initialize 20+ default clothing items, and handle cart operations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old product/cart data (simple Nat price, no brand/category/sizes) into the new schema with Float price, brand, category, sizes, and rating fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (clothing catalog, filtering/search, product detail modal, clothing-specific cart) to their source files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a reference for the app's component structure and responsibilities.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file defining Tailwind base styles and OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens used throughout the app.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the StyleMart app, setting the page title, meta description, and importing Nunito and Inter fonts from Google Fonts.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that sets up TanStack Router with routes for catalog, cart, checkout, and order confirmation pages, all wrapped in a shared Layout with Header and Footer.
frontend/src/components/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart component displaying cart items in a two-column layout with a price summary panel showing item count, total, free delivery, and a Place Order button.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Renders a single cart item with product image, name, size, price, and discount info, plus controls to increase/decrease quantity or remove the item using cart mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Displays a horizontal scrollable list of category filter buttons (All, Men, Women, Kids, Accessories) and highlights the currently selected one.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a site footer with brand info, shop links, help links, copyright, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with the StyleMart logo, desktop nav link, cart icon with item count badge, and a mobile slide-out menu sheet.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays a product card with image, brand, name, star rating, price, and optional discount badge; triggers an onClick callback when clicked.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetailMod: Modal dialog showing full product details (image, description, rating, price, sizes) with a size selector and an Add to Cart button that calls the addToCart mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Fetches and displays a responsive grid of ProductCards, auto-initializes products if none exist, and shows skeleton loaders or empty-state messages as needed.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Controlled search input with a search icon and a clear (X) button that resets the value.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes due to identity updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and React provider, exposing login/logout functions, identity state, and login status via a custom hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query hooks for all backend interactions including fetching products, managing the cart (add, remove, update quantity), and checkout.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind CSS styles, CSS custom properties for light/dark theme color tokens, and reusable component utility classes for the StyleMart app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Renders the shopping cart page with a back-navigation button and the Cart component inside a full-screen layout.
frontend/src/pages/Catalog.tsx: Product catalog page featuring a hero banner, search bar, category filter, and a product grid with a detail modal; filters products client-side based on search and category.
frontend/src/pages/Checkout.tsx: Checkout page that collects delivery information via a form, displays an order summary from the cart, and calls the checkout mutation before navigating to a confirmation page.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmation.tsx: Displays a post-purchase order confirmation page with a success icon, order processing/delivery info cards, and a 'Continue Shopping' button that navigates back to the home route.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based colors, border radii, box shadows, font families (Inter/Nunito), and accordion keyframe animations, plus plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks the overall project state (version 9) for a Flipkart-inspired online clothing store, including architectural notes, required product/brand images with dimensions, and a list of existing implemented features.
